item.title: CKS
item.description: SSH security Restrict Kernal modules Open Ports & Listening ports netstat -an | grep -w LISTEN Check ports are used by which services cat /etc/services | grep -w 53 List processes and thier ports netstat -natp netstat -natp | grep "9090"
